price: 仿佛他们没有在里面住过一样。真的，愿麦德彦人遭受毁灭，犹如赛莫德人遭受毁灭一样！
arabic: كَأَن لَّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡاْ فِيهَآۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّمَدۡيَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتۡ ثَمُودُ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: ka-an lam yaghnaw fīhā alā buʿ'dan limadyana kamā baʿidat thamūdu
